## ExtractDeps type

Extract the combined dependency type from a record of DefinedServices.

Used by `compose()` to infer the required deps parameter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExtractDeps<T extends Record<string, DefinedService>> = UnionToIntersection<T[keyof T] extends Service<unknown, infer C> ? C : never>;
```
**References:** [DefinedService](../definedservice/)<!-- -->, [UnionToIntersection](../uniontointersection/)<!-- -->, [Service](../service/)

## Example


```ts
type Factories = {
  signal: DefinedService<{ consumer: Consumer }>;
  computed: DefinedService<{ track: TrackFn }>;
};

type Deps = ExtractDeps<Factories>;
// Deps = { consumer: Consumer } & { track: TrackFn }
```
